title: Who Can Explain?
text:
"Who Can Explain?" is a song written by <a href="Abner%20Silver">Abner Silver</a> and <a href="Roy%20Alfred">Roy Alfred</a> and performed by <a href="The%20Teenagers">Frankie Lymon and The Teenagers</a> featuring Jimmy Wright and His Orchestra. It reached #7 on the <a href="Hot%20R%26amp%3BB/Hip-Hop%20Songs">US R&B chart</a> in 1956. The song was featured on their 1956 album, "<a href="The%20Teenagers%20Featuring%20Frankie%20Lymon">The Teenagers Featuring Frankie Lymon</a>".
The single's <a href="A-side%20and%20B-side">A-side</a>, "<a href="I%20Promise%20to%20Remember">I Promise to Remember</a>", reached #10 on the US R&B chart and #57 on the <a href="Billboard%20Hot%20100">"Billboard" pop chart</a>.
